programme.title: Life After
programme.desc: A single mother and Indian immigrant travels to New York City to clear out her daughter's apartment.

programme.title: The Last Emperor
programme.desc: Named Emperor of China at age 3 in 1908, Pu Yi (John Lone) becomes a prisoner of destiny.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: Philip is a young Englishman who falls under the spell of a beautiful but manipulative woman named Rachel. As his obsession for her grows, she hatches a scheme to win back her late husband's estate from the unsuspecting Philip.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The assassination of JFK is seen through the eyes of Jackie Kennedy. The days leading up to the tragedy and the immediate aftermath are chronicled, as experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: Gifted
programme.desc: A man wages a legal battle against his mother for custody of his orphaned niece, a young mathematics prodigy who wants to live with him.

programme.title: The Florida Project
programme.desc: Set in the shadow of the most magical place on Earth, 6-year-old Moonee and her two best friends forge their own adventures, while Moonee's struggling mom and a kindhearted motel manager protect the kids from the harsh reality that surrounds them.

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Things go from bad to worse when a murder witness (Liam Hemsworth) in small-town Montana tries to leverage the crime into a get-rich-quick scheme.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: After a serious car accident, a man (Liam Neeson) awakes to find that his wife does not recognize him, that another man has assumed his identity, and that assassins are hunting him.

programme.title: Working Girls
programme.desc: A photographer (Louise Smith) and others work for a yuppie madam (Ellen McElduff) in a Manhattan brothel, then go home.

programme.title: This Is Not a War Story
programme.desc: Some veterans take part in an unusual art project designed to help them deal with the leftover trauma associated with their combat experiences.

programme.title: College Football

programme.title: College Football

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 15 Panthers (10-2) and No. 16 Demon Deacons (10-2) collide in the ACC championship game. Pittsburgh seeks its first conference title. Wake Forest wore the crown in 2006. The Deacons' Sam Hartman is ninth nationally with 34 TD passes in 2021.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Spartans visit the Eagles. Michigan State is off to its second 3-0 start in four years after a 40-0 masterclass versus Prairie View A&M on Sept. 14. Boston College suffered its first loss in the Bill O'Brien era, 27-21 to then-No. 6 Missouri.

programme.title: The Cow
